definition: sheng, a free reed wind instrument with vertical bamboo pipes

sentences.english: Lusheng is different from other reed musical instruments in its second resonance.
sentences.chinese: 芦笙以二次共鸣区别于其他簧管乐器。

sentences.english: Lusheng dance is performed on Lahu traditional festivals such as Gourd Festival.
sentences.chinese: 拉祜族节日跳芦笙舞，澜沧县还过“葫芦节”。

sentences.english: The accompaniment musical instruments are Miao flute, Lusheng, bracket harp, etc.
sentences.chinese: 伴奏乐器有苗笛，芦笙，牛腿琴等。

definition: suona, Chinese shawm/see 嗩吶|唢呐
Hmong or Miao ethnic group of southwest China
suona, Chinese shawm (oboe), used in festivals and processions or for military purposes/also written 鎖吶|锁呐/also called 喇叭[la3 ba5]
Yao ethnic group of southwest China and southeast Asia
answering phrase of duet/to sing antiphonal answer
Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group
opera for popular in Sichuan and Yunnan
Gelao or Klau ethnic group of Guizhou
